textfinal:
Congratulations! You have finished
the scenario!
helpinfo: Up/Down - change page, Escape - back to the main menu
help1_2:
For Great and Powerful Trixie,
things turned sour...
She got only a coin for the last
show. And for the one before...
even less.
help1_3:
Having spent last money on Applejack's cider, she
went to the castle of her best friend, secretly hoping
to get a piece of advice.
help2_1:
"No money at all, right?", Starlight
answered. "I heard from Rarity
that almost nearby, on the border
with Everfree Forest, diamonds
appear right under your hooves,
just have time!"
help3_2:
The goal of each level - to collect a
specific number of diamonds and not
to lose all health touching the monsters.
help3_3: Remaining health is shown like this:
help4_2:
Trixie can walk, attack, cast shield and teleport
between upper and lower platforms.
Teleportation consumes 1 point of mana.
Fireball toss consumes 3 points of mana.
Force shield consumes 2 points of mana.
The mana pool restores by the time and is shown as
bottles:
help5_2:
Left / Right arrow - walk
Space - stop
Up / Down arrow - teleportation
Ctrl - toss a fireball
Alt - cast a shield
Escape - pause
about_info:
An arcade game about Trixie and collecting diamonds. Developed
with C++/QtScript/SFML. Author - Aleksandr V. Tereshenkov.
Home pages: tav-developer.itch.io and github.com/tereshenkovav
